Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI helps me improve the standard of my assignments to some extent through improving vocab, clarity and flow of my assignments but I have found it to be poor at providing specific feedback and grammar. However, it is an amazing tool for helping me learn to write a sets a base standard for me to work on and improve and have grown great skills from the start of my degree through using AI that would have taken me years to develop without it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really but feedback is just generally not as strong or specific from AI.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: APA writing standards are not well done by AI
